```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(viridis)
library(plotly)
```


```{r dataset and clean names}
data("instacart")
instacart_clean = instacart %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```

```{r sample}
set.seed(5)
instacart_clean_sample = instacart %>% 
  sample_n(100)
```

```{r line graph}
instacart_clean_sample %>% 
  group_by(order_dow) %>%
  summarize(orders = n()) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~order_dow, y = ~orders, type = "scatter", mode = "lines",
          alpha = 0.5) %>% 
  layout(
    title = "Hour vs orders Line Graph", 
    xaxis = list(title = "hour"))
```
